column5: Sorry, link only. No YouTube yet.  http://www.theglobea...article2361299/  And his wife isn't too happy :dunno:....
Mount it?  I'd be selling that sucker to the highest bidder!
Maybe feed a small country,LOL sell it!
Tuna steaks, Tuna salad, Tuna casserole, Tuna sushi...he should be good for meals for a week or two.

take it to japan that fish is woth $100,000 dollars !!!!!   im suprised they didnt come and want to buy that fish right away,a really decent bluefin will go for $20,000 ...but regardless congrats too him...WOW

its truly sad really, all the big predators are being slaughtered wholesale It is a free for all until its gone and then what. a very high percentage of the top end is gone and not coming back it is having devestating effects everywhere I have footage that you would not even begin to believe from friends down east that fish for a living(small inshore/offshore boats). tons and tons of fish thrown overboard dead because they werent part of the quota that have ben compressed in a dragger net. Okay im stopping because its making me boil.  Take a picture throw it back would you be this happy or easy on someone that keeps a 70lb muskie I dont think so  Peter
